fields.summary: Cannot comment on mobile view
Nested numbered list items rendering incorrectly
Recent questions for topic X query is slow
Avatar have not been migrated
Questions admin robots.txt text

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47735].
  {panel}

we've implemented "accept an answer" and need to polish the experience. Some things to consider:
* How do we communicate what the feature is?
* Review for ADG _compliance_
* is green colour coding sufficient for indicating acceptance state? (e.g. do we need an icon for colour bling people?)
fields.summary: "Accept answer" UX polish
I have to click on the first line of the editor to start editing my question's description

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47732].
  {panel}

Or even 1k like Quora does so they are easier to read 1.1k

Places where this comes up:
* Profile screen
* Votes (I presume)
* Experts stats 

e.g. 
http://cl.ly/image/191R2e2e3H0R
fields.summary: large numbers often don't fit the UI well

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47731].
  {panel}

h4. Steps to reproduce

# Write an answer to a CQ that contains a link to another CQ. I did it by
## highlighting the text I wanted linked,
## using the editor's link button, and
## searching for the title of the question
# Have someone upvote the answer, triggering an email notification.

The email notification will look fine except for the link to the other CQ, which will appear as the ID of the CQ instead of the expected link text.

It will look OK on the actual CQ site though.
fields.summary: Notification emails don't render links to other CQs properly

Happens in Confluence version 5.4-OD-4

h1.Steps to Reproduce:
# Created a new OD instance.
# Accept demo content for Questions
# Click on a question.
# Receive error.

This occurs in normal instances with existing content and new instances with demo content.
fields.summary: Clicking on question produces 500 error

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47729].
  {panel}

Using the new "upload new version" functionality that is in the Previewer it is possible to upload a new version of an image to question/answer even if you do not have the permission to edit the question/answer.

*How to Recreate*
1. Visit a question
!cq1.jpg|thumbnail!
2. Click to open previewer
!cq2.jpg|thumbnail!
3. Click upload new version and select a new file
!cq3.jpg|thumbnail!
4. Now the image in the question is updated
!cq4.jpg|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Possible to upload new version of image even if you can not edit the question

fields.description:
I feel like I've banned a hundred accounts in the last week.

It is good to see that a new spam account can only create three questions initially, but it's obvious that the Captcha on signup has now been thoroughly broken and we need to reconsider improved anti-spam-user techniques.

I would start with
1) A look at a better Captcha system in the short term (the fact the current one simply isn't good enough strongly suggests that better ones will be broken in the future, so it's only a quick temporary fix)

2) Spam analysis algorithms - blacklisting of new user's postings unless they actually look coherent and vaguely relevant

3) Absolute block on posting of links for new accounts (the main reason they do it is to get links picked up by search engines, so removing that facility removes any incentive to do this).  Although I'd consider a whitelist so that links to other questions or Atlassian documentation are allowed through
fields.summary: Spam filters have been defeated
Atlassian ID profile updates are not working on Atlassian Answers
weird UI when dragging and dropping an image onto a question
Ability for users to delete their own questions, answers and comments
Links to embedded images not working in some cases?
Some users are unable to login with Atlassian ID
User email addresses should not be visible in public instances
Topics are displayed more than once in the topics list
Support "Ask a question" button on marketplace leads to 404 page not found
Double email received.
Wrong message when leaving question page after writing an answer

fields.description: It doesn't seem to be possible to link CQs to JIRA issues in the same fashion that one might link Confluence pages into JIRA.  It only seems possible by pasting in the web link to the CQ, which isn't optimal given that if the question name changes so will the address of the CQ.
fields.summary: Cannot link to Confluence Questions in JIRA, like a usual Confluence page.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47706].

From Matt Ryall:

"It's just the normal arrow cursor, rather than a "pointer".

Bonus points if you implement a neat magnifying glass cursor [like Flickr has on their photo pages|http://www.flickr.com/photos/antelope_reflections/10505603064/in/explore-2013-10-26], and make it work for all thumbnails in Confluence. :)"

on https://support.atlassian.com/browse/CQS-118

fields.summary: Ad hoc Workflows throws an exception on every question page
All topic links become confluenceundefined after creating new topic while editing question or creating question
space discovery help tip should not display if questions sidebar link is off-screen
Exception when watching questions list for a given topic with lot of content
The demo content endpoint should never create the demo content twice
ReputationChangedEvent is not published when bounties are awarded

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47694].
  {panel}

I observed to erroneous behaviors in Answers, but I couldn't determine the cause of them. They are not reproducible, it seems to happen randomly.

# First I filtered by *Unanswered* questions. Among the results I could see a few questions which already had 1 answer on them. The thing in common these already answered questions had is that they didn't have upvotes (so my first tought was that Answers was also listing answered questions that just didn't receive any upvotes). I couldn't reproduce this.
# After, filtering by *Recent* questions, I was seeing a list with questions created up to 3 hours ago, and then suddenly questions created in January 2014 (many months before, considering today is September 24) and older. For this I took a screenshot:
!answersrecent.png|thumbnail!
For this one I was able to refresh the page and reproduce this.
fields.summary: Wrong questions listed for specific filters

*Steps to replicate*
# Ensure your current user has posted an Answer in Confluence Questions with topics
# Go to user Profile (click on your Profile Picture > Profile)

Go to "<baseURL>/questions/topics" and search manually

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47668].
  {panel}

When a question has been answered the display does not currently show that it has been answered. The "green check" icon is the indicator that an answer has been accepted, however, we believe that the user experience would be improved if the display included one or all of the following enhancements:

1. An indicator that someone has answered the question even if it has not yet been accepted.

2. An excerpt of the answer (first few words or first line of the answer).

3. A mention (@username) of the accepted answer's user name.

Please advise as to the feasibility of these requested enhancements and the turnaround time.

Thank you!
fields.summary: Displaying an excerpt of the answer when a question has been answered, or showing who's answer has been accepted.

fields.description:
When you use the Questions List macro, it allows you to specify which topics should be disabled, separated by commas.  This allows topics with spaces to be entered.

But when you Click to Create a new Question, it fills in the topic, but they are added as individual topics broken apart at the spaces.  Furthermore, you can't even create a topic with spaces in it from even the normal ask a question interface.

So either the Question List macro should be updated to not allow topics with spaces (it should separate them into separate topics) or allow Topics with spaces ((/) I vote for this).
fields.summary: Question List macro allows topics with spaces

fields.description:
We have just started using Confluence Questions, but already users are seeing some differences between the reputation chart and their points.
In this case, we think there is a bug with the points calculation/display because the user has 2 accepted answers and 3 upvotes= 60 points. However, the screenshot shows that she has 30 points.
This is important because the whole idea of experts is that they are trying to get more points to be more "credible" and the points algorithm is published so this is causing concern that they do not receive credit for their contributions.
fields.summary: The expert points count is incorrect

{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47623].
  {panel}

The email notification that is send out when I add someone to a topic watchlist contains a broken link which results in a "Not Found" error page. This is because we have Confluence running under a context name and not under the root and the link does not include the context. This seems to be an issue specific to this email. It works fine in other CQ emails.

Email in Link points to: https://www.myserver.com/questions/topics/21266463/pmo?src=email
Correct would be: https://www.myserver.com/confluence/questions/topics/21266463/pmo?src=email

Proposed solution: The email should use the Confluence Server Base URL and not just the host.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47605].
  {panel}

We believe there may be a small subset of users who will experience this problem when logging in to Atlassian Answers now that the migration to Confluence Questions is complete.

Instead of being linked to their own user account, they will instead be linked to a different account with a similar name.  This appears to be related to the way in which Atlassian ID maps users to local account names.

We are still investigating the extent of this issue, and whether or not we can solve it via a bulk update.

If you encounter this problem, please comment on this issue and we should be able to solve it for your account with a once-off configuration change.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47592].
  {panel}

*Steps to reproduce:*
- Run CQ in standalone mode (disable Confluence Spaces plugin)
- Go to Global Permissions (the CQ version)
- Enable anonymous access to Confluence Questions
- Go to a question with an image attached or directly to the confluence attachment link.

*Expected Behaviour*
- The Confluence Questions image is displayed

*Actual Behaviour*
Direct Link:
- The user is redirected to a login prompt
Confluence Question Page:
- The user is displayed a broken image

*Cause?*
This seems to happen because Confluence is still respecting the non-CQ, global anonymous usage permissions when accessing attachments/images in Confluence.  

*Side Note:*
If you enable the Confluence Spaces plugin, go to global permissions and enable *Use Confluence* permissions for anonymous users, then it works as expected once the Confluence Spaces plugin is disabled again. If you leave spaces enabled access issues to images are still prevalent.
fields.summary: Anonymous access to images in Confluence Questions
